name: Uproar in Bug Parliament
description:
Doctor Spider has been called to the capital to replace his MP, Lord Hermit. But there is a deep rift between the ideologies of Ants and Grasshoppers in the Assembly, and a new bill is on the way…

Godot Wild Jam theme: Assembly Required

Wild cards used in this game: "Four color limit", and "Thermometer". I also tried to keep the game very small (the .pck is under 400 KB uncompressed, and well under 360 KB zipped).

I wonder if you can spot the custom wild card?

Controls:

- Click/Enter to  show next dialogue line
- Move mouse cursor and click to look around
- During pheromone mini-games, click on word circles before they exit the screen.
